		// "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mjz_bogduggs_cudgel_Description"			"团队价值：%item_value%<br>需要等级：%required_level%\n\n<h1>被动：粉碎</h1>近战英雄有效。所有攻击速度减少%attack_speed_penalty_pct%%%，但是攻击在目标%damage_radius%范围内造成溅射伤害，并且眩晕%stun_duration%秒。\n额外力量：<font color='#FF1800'>%bonus_strength_level_0% + %bonus_strength_per_level% x 宝物等级</font><br>攻击力加成：<font color='#FF1800'>%bonus_damage_level_0% + %bonus_damage_per_level% x 宝物等级</font>"
